title: #208 - Stu Stone & ME
description:
Rapper & Actor Stu Stone & I hang out in the Mancave & talk about him partying w/ the Wu Tang Clan, getting high w/ Seth Rogan & Patrick Swayze on the set of Donnie Darko, and he walks me through one of the funniest things I've ever seen on Television - Him & Jamie Kennedy on MTV's Blowin' Up - dresssing in FULL make up as black men & rapping with the Three 6 Mafia.

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
